ApplicationSubmissionInfoGrp.FormAndInfoAndMaterialsTxt: INDIVIDUAL LETTERS ARE PROVIDED TO ART INSTITUIONS TO PUBLICIZE SCHOLARSHIPS AT THEIR FACILITY FOR ART STUDENTS TO APPLY.
